edu.napier.geo.queryOsmAPI.model

Class Way

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.napier.geo.queryOsmAPI.model.Element
      • edu.napier.geo.queryOsmAPI.model.Way

  • public class Way
extends Element
    A way is an OSM element, which combines several Nodes to create a path.
    Author:
    Adrien PAVIE
